title: DE--Delaware Governor-Illness
headline: Illness forces Delaware governor John Carney to postpone annual State of the State address
headline_extended: Delaware Gov. John Carney has postponed his scheduled State of the State address because of illness
description_summary: Delaware Gov. John Carney has postponed his scheduled State of the State address because of illness. Carney's office announced the postponement Thursday morning, hours before he was to speak to a joint session of the General Assembly. Officials provided few details in a statement. They said only that the 67-year-old Democrat has a fever and mild symptoms, but is in good spirits. A spokeswoman for the governor said Carney had tested negative for COVID-19. The State of the State Address will be rescheduled for a date yet to be determined. Carney is in the final year of his second term as governor.

body_nitf:
DOVER, Del. (AP) — Democratic Gov. John Carney was forced to postpone his scheduled State of the State address on Thursday because of illness, his office said.

Officials provided few details in a statement, saying only that Carney has “a fever and mild symptoms” but was in good spirits. A spokeswoman later said Carney, 67, had tested negative for COVID-19.

The State of the State Address will be rescheduled for a date yet to be determined.

Carney announced in May 2022 that, after receiving the coronavirus vaccine and two booster shots, he had tested positive for COVID-19 after experiencing mild symptoms. Carney also tested positive for COVID-19 in January 2023, again saying he was experiencing mild symptoms.

Carney is in the final year of his second term as governor. He has formed a campaign committee as he explores a possible bid for mayor of Wilmington, Delaware's largest city.

Health.reason: The document discusses the illness of Delaware Governor John Carney, including details about his symptoms, previous COVID-19 infections, and his current health status. While the primary focus is on the postponement of the State of the State address, the information provided is directly related to health, particularly the governor's health. Therefore, it is relevant to the topic of health.
